## [GmailThread](https://developers.google.com/apps-script/reference/gmail/gmail-thread)

### Methods

|                                                                     Method                                                                      |                                        Return type                                        |                                                                     Brief description                                                                      |
|-------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------|-------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------|------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------|
| [addLabel(label)](https://developers.google.com/apps-script/reference/gmail/gmail-thread#addLabel(GmailLabel))                                  | [GmailThread](https://developers.google.com/apps-script/reference/gmail/gmail-thread)     | Adds this label to the thread.                                                                                                                             |
| [createDraftReply(body)](https://developers.google.com/apps-script/reference/gmail/gmail-thread#createDraftReply(String))                       | [GmailDraft](https://developers.google.com/apps-script/reference/gmail/gmail-draft)       | Creates a draft message replying to the sender of the last message in this thread using the reply-to address.                                              |
| [createDraftReply(body, options)](https://developers.google.com/apps-script/reference/gmail/gmail-thread#createDraftReply(String,Object))       | [GmailDraft](https://developers.google.com/apps-script/reference/gmail/gmail-draft)       | Creates a draft message replying to the sender of the last message in this thread using the reply-to address, with optional arguments.                     |
| [createDraftReplyAll(body)](https://developers.google.com/apps-script/reference/gmail/gmail-thread#createDraftReplyAll(String))                 | [GmailDraft](https://developers.google.com/apps-script/reference/gmail/gmail-draft)       | Creates a draft message replying to the sender of the last message in this thread, using the reply-to address and all recipients of this message.          |
| [createDraftReplyAll(body, options)](https://developers.google.com/apps-script/reference/gmail/gmail-thread#createDraftReplyAll(String,Object)) | [GmailDraft](https://developers.google.com/apps-script/reference/gmail/gmail-draft)       | Creates a draft message replying to the sender of the last message in this thread, using the reply-to address and all recipients, with optional arguments. |
| [getFirstMessageSubject()](https://developers.google.com/apps-script/reference/gmail/gmail-thread#getFirstMessageSubject())                     | `String`                                                                                  | Gets the subject of the first message in the thread.                                                                                                       |
| [getId()](https://developers.google.com/apps-script/reference/gmail/gmail-thread#getId())                                                       | `String`                                                                                  | Gets the ID of this thread.                                                                                                                                |
| [getLabels()](https://developers.google.com/apps-script/reference/gmail/gmail-thread#getLabels())                                               | [GmailLabel[]](https://developers.google.com/apps-script/reference/gmail/gmail-label)     | Returns the user-created labels on this thread.                                                                                                            |
| [getLastMessageDate()](https://developers.google.com/apps-script/reference/gmail/gmail-thread#getLastMessageDate())                             | `Date`                                                                                    | Gets the date of this thread's most recent message.                                                                                                        |
| [getMessageCount()](https://developers.google.com/apps-script/reference/gmail/gmail-thread#getMessageCount())                                   | `Integer`                                                                                 | Returns the number of messages in the thread.                                                                                                              |
| [getMessages()](https://developers.google.com/apps-script/reference/gmail/gmail-thread#getMessages())                                           | [GmailMessage[]](https://developers.google.com/apps-script/reference/gmail/gmail-message) | Gets the messages in this thread.                                                                                                                          |
| [getPermalink()](https://developers.google.com/apps-script/reference/gmail/gmail-thread#getPermalink())                                         | `String`                                                                                  | Gets a permalink for this thread.                                                                                                                          |
| [hasStarredMessages()](https://developers.google.com/apps-script/reference/gmail/gmail-thread#hasStarredMessages())                             | `Boolean`                                                                                 | Returns whether the thread has any starred messages.                                                                                                       |
| [isImportant()](https://developers.google.com/apps-script/reference/gmail/gmail-thread#isImportant())                                           | `Boolean`                                                                                 | Returns whether the thread is marked as important.                                                                                                         |
| [isInChats()](https://developers.google.com/apps-script/reference/gmail/gmail-thread#isInChats())                                               | `Boolean`                                                                                 | Returns whether the thread is labeled a chat.                                                                                                              |
| [isInInbox()](https://developers.google.com/apps-script/reference/gmail/gmail-thread#isInInbox())                                               | `Boolean`                                                                                 | Returns whether the thread is in the inbox.                                                                                                                |
| [isInPriorityInbox()](https://developers.google.com/apps-script/reference/gmail/gmail-thread#isInPriorityInbox())                               | `Boolean`                                                                                 | Returns true if this thread is in the priority inbox; returns false otherwise.                                                                             |
| [isInSpam()](https://developers.google.com/apps-script/reference/gmail/gmail-thread#isInSpam())                                                 | `Boolean`                                                                                 | Returns whether the thread is marked as spam.                                                                                                              |
| [isInTrash()](https://developers.google.com/apps-script/reference/gmail/gmail-thread#isInTrash())                                               | `Boolean`                                                                                 | Returns whether the thread is in the trash.                                                                                                                |
| [isUnread()](https://developers.google.com/apps-script/reference/gmail/gmail-thread#isUnread())                                                 | `Boolean`                                                                                 | Returns whether the thread has any unread messages.                                                                                                        |
| [markImportant()](https://developers.google.com/apps-script/reference/gmail/gmail-thread#markImportant())                                       | [GmailThread](https://developers.google.com/apps-script/reference/gmail/gmail-thread)     | Marks this thread as important.                                                                                                                            |
| [markRead()](https://developers.google.com/apps-script/reference/gmail/gmail-thread#markRead())                                                 | [GmailThread](https://developers.google.com/apps-script/reference/gmail/gmail-thread)     | Marks this thread as read.                                                                                                                                 |
| [markUnimportant()](https://developers.google.com/apps-script/reference/gmail/gmail-thread#markUnimportant())                                   | [GmailThread](https://developers.google.com/apps-script/reference/gmail/gmail-thread)     | Marks this thread as unimportant.                                                                                                                          |
| [markUnread()](https://developers.google.com/apps-script/reference/gmail/gmail-thread#markUnread())                                             | [GmailThread](https://developers.google.com/apps-script/reference/gmail/gmail-thread)     | Marks this thread as unread.                                                                                                                               |
| [moveToArchive()](https://developers.google.com/apps-script/reference/gmail/gmail-thread#moveToArchive())                                       | [GmailThread](https://developers.google.com/apps-script/reference/gmail/gmail-thread)     | Moves this thread to the archive.                                                                                                                          |
| [moveToInbox()](https://developers.google.com/apps-script/reference/gmail/gmail-thread#moveToInbox())                                           | [GmailThread](https://developers.google.com/apps-script/reference/gmail/gmail-thread)     | Moves this thread to the inbox.                                                                                                                            |
| [moveToSpam()](https://developers.google.com/apps-script/reference/gmail/gmail-thread#moveToSpam())                                             | [GmailThread](https://developers.google.com/apps-script/reference/gmail/gmail-thread)     | Moves this thread to spam.                                                                                                                                 |
| [moveToTrash()](https://developers.google.com/apps-script/reference/gmail/gmail-thread#moveToTrash())                                           | [GmailThread](https://developers.google.com/apps-script/reference/gmail/gmail-thread)     | Moves this thread to the trash.                                                                                                                            |
| [refresh()](https://developers.google.com/apps-script/reference/gmail/gmail-thread#refresh())                                                   | [GmailThread](https://developers.google.com/apps-script/reference/gmail/gmail-thread)     | Reloads this thread, and associated state from Gmail (useful in case the labels, read state, etc., have changed).                                          |
| [removeLabel(label)](https://developers.google.com/apps-script/reference/gmail/gmail-thread#removeLabel(GmailLabel))                            | [GmailThread](https://developers.google.com/apps-script/reference/gmail/gmail-thread)     | Removes this label from the thread.                                                                                                                        |
| [reply(body)](https://developers.google.com/apps-script/reference/gmail/gmail-thread#reply(String))                                             | [GmailThread](https://developers.google.com/apps-script/reference/gmail/gmail-thread)     | Reply to the sender of the last message on this thread using the replyTo address.                                                                          |
| [reply(body, options)](https://developers.google.com/apps-script/reference/gmail/gmail-thread#reply(String,Object))                             | [GmailThread](https://developers.google.com/apps-script/reference/gmail/gmail-thread)     | Reply to the sender of the last message on this thread using the replyTo address, with optional arguments.                                                 |
| [replyAll(body)](https://developers.google.com/apps-script/reference/gmail/gmail-thread#replyAll(String))                                       | [GmailThread](https://developers.google.com/apps-script/reference/gmail/gmail-thread)     | Reply to the sender (using the replyTo address), and all recipients of the last message on this thread.                                                    |
| [replyAll(body, options)](https://developers.google.com/apps-script/reference/gmail/gmail-thread#replyAll(String,Object))                       | [GmailThread](https://developers.google.com/apps-script/reference/gmail/gmail-thread)     | Reply to the sender (using the `reply``To` address), and all recipients of the last message on this thread, with optional arguments.                       |
